title: FuelEconomy.gov Data
text: Bored mtcars? Want play around tcl/tk menus R? Looking buy new car? mpg package provides access FuelEconomy.gov API, allowing users pull vehicle-specific comprehensive U.S. fuel economy data available makes, models, years since 1984 (provides easy access Excel-formatted data files going back 1978). package also wraps MPG service, allows drivers upload fuel usage data. package released GPL-2 data accessible via API public domain.

title: FuelEconomy.gov Data
text: pull data FuelEconomy API, one needs know vehicle identification number specific make-model-year. mpg therefore provides set functions: feYears, feMakes, feModels, feOptions sequentially interactively retrieving vehicle identification number. interactive wrapper function pickVehicle simplifies process running functions either (1) tcl/tk menus (2) text-based menus R console. example latter menu version shown : vehicle identification number hand, easy pull vehicle-specific fuel economy emissions data: Integration MPG site also enables download user-submitted fuel economy data, either averages vehicle type individual-level (.e., single driver’s reported fuel data): MPG API also possible identify sets individual vehicle data using mympgVehicles (based make model retrieved mympgMakes mympgModels interactive menus similar pickVehicle specifying pick=TRUE either mympgAvg mympgAll).

title: Fuel economy codebook — feCodebook
text: View list variable names descriptions vehicle fuel economy data

title: Fuel economy codebook — feCodebook
text: browse logical indicating whether open web-based codebok. Default FALSE.

title: Bulk data — feData
text: Download fuel economy bulk data files

title: Vehicle emissions data — feEmissions
text: Retrieve vehicle emissions data vehicle ID

title: Vehicle emissions data — feEmissions
text: pick logical indicating whether select ID number via interactive menu.

title: Vehicle makes — feMakes
text: year character string containing four-digit vehicle year.

title: Vehicle models — feModels
text: year character string containing four-digit vehicle year.

title: Vehicle models — feModels
text: make character string containing vehicle make.

title: Vehicle options — feOptions
text: year character string containing four-digit vehicle year.

title: Vehicle options — feOptions
text: make character string containing vehicle make.

title: Vehicle options — feOptions
text: model character string containing vehicle model.

title: Fuel prices — fePrices
text: Retrieve current fuel prices fuel type.

title: API Query — feQuery
text: op character string containing API operation, associated arguments.

title: API Query — feQuery
text: baseurl base URL conducting API query.

title: Vehicle fuel economy — feVehicle
text: Retrieve vehicle fuel economy vehicle ID

title: Vehicle fuel economy — feVehicle
text: pick logical indicating whether select ID number via interactive menu.

title: Fuel economy years — feYears
text: Retrieve years fuel economy data available

title: FuelEconomy.gov Data — mpg-package

text: pick logical indicating whether select ID number via interactive menu.

text: make character string containing vehicle make.

text: Retrieve MPG vehicle data make model

text: make character string containing vehicle make.

title: My MPG vehicles — mympgVehicles
text: model character string containing vehicle model.

text: pick logical indicating whether select ID number via interactive menu.

title: My MPG vehicles — mympgVehicles
text: graphics pick=TRUE, logical indicating whether use graphical menus (default) , FALSE, text-based menus.

title: Interactive vehicle menus — pickVehicle
text: Use interactive menus retrieve vehicle identification number

text: graphics logical indicating whether use graphical menus (default) , FALSE, text-based menus.
